DOC.brief_summary: Does diabetic patient ' glycemic control affect response laser and/or intravitreal injection therapy term visual anatomical outcome .
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate visual anatomical response therapy patient diabetic macular edema ( DME ) relation glycemic control . Patients DME central foveal thickness ( CFT ) > 250µm proliferative disease glycosolated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) measure baseline 3 month . CFT optical coherence tomography , best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) logMARs measure baseline , 1 , 3 month . Exclusion criterion : laser intravitreal injection within 6 month , hard exudate within 500um foveal center , macular traction . Therapy include laser intravitreal anti VEGFs . HbA1c grade : G1= < 7 % , G2= 7-7.9 % , G3= 8-8.9 % , G4 = > 9 % ; : low < 8 % , high ≥ 8 % .
DOC.criteria: Central foveal thickness 250 micron Proliferative Diabetic Retinopathy . Traction Macular Membranes Previous Laser intravitreal injection within 6 month .
